mapper.select: SELECT t.`user_id` AS id, t.`user_name` AS userName, t.`user_tel` AS userTel, t.`user_password` AS userPasword, t.`user_address` AS userAddress, t.`user_register_date` AS userRegisterDate, t.`user_online_state` AS userOnlineState, t.`user_real_name` AS userRealName, t.`user_id_card_front` AS userIdCardFront, t.`user_id_card_reverse` AS userIdCardReverse, T.`user_id_card_runholder` AS userIdCardRunholder FROM user_info_t t
